post.body: It's one of my favs. I think you really capture Chris and Jill's voices perfectly. And your Chris is <3
I was re-reading some of those on FF.net last weekend. I still have mad love the RE3 AU one with Chris <3
Good luck! Try not to laugh as much as I did :)
Even when we're 1700km apart, little sis and I have the same thoughts enough to be creepy. I think we should have been twins.
That could be fun. I'd love to see my boss's face if he came upstairs to find me wearing a gas mask.Ooh, a tax deduction maybe?
Kick it once for me!
Too much white-out, you think? This stuff should really come with a warning about using in well-ventilated areas.
I'm having a mental blank trying to think of any movies with Xmas references other than Love Actually. What else have you got?
Good luck! Let me know if you need me to knock some heads together for you *cracks knuckles*
I loved the first two books, and was disappointed in the third. I'm really curious to see the show, and I've heard good things!
Bored and impatient and ready to go home now, thanks.
Talking Twilight and the criminal lack of sparkly Edward in the movie. Actually kind of fun. Twilight never fails to bring the lulz.
Just offered to give the girl I work with my copies of New Moon and Eclipse to keep. She's already got Twilight or I'd give her that too.
Standing in a hugeass line at the post office to buy a stamp. Totally ridiculous.
Thinking about lunch time. Three minutes to go.
Ebay is being a bitch. It keeps asking me for a verification code every time I enter my password but it won't let me sign in. Grr.
Bored, tired and high on white-out fumes.
Just saw a children's show with a talking lawnmower named Larry on TV in the tea room. I'm a little creeped out.
Free choc fudge brownie, score.
Not convinced this mediation the other two girls went to today is going to change anything. Just move moody girl out of our section already.
Just got an application for a new company incorporation with SEVEN individual officeholders adflkjasdl. That's going to be fun to mark-up.
Playing Code Veronica on Gamecube. Already gotten further than I've ever played before, but no Chris yet. Plenty of Steve though. Yay?
Playing in Pictochat with Tim and Pippy. The first rule of Pictochat is someone always draws a penis.
Picking up cream buns from the bakery and heading to Nan's place for morning tea.
Just woke up from a nap. Can smell roast beef cooking for dinner. Going to see what's on Austar.
Putting up Christmas decorations at Nan's place. Dust is making my allergies play up.
At home in Cloncurry. Flight was good. Had a bit of turbulence but that just makes it more exciting. Thinking about havi√≤;!lunch and a nap.
Sitting at the airport, waiting for boarding. Running on only four hours sleep. Thinking of playing some Elite Beat Agents to pass the time.
FINALLY. Freedom!
Still waiting. And the work filter is stopping me from looking at potential RE5 spoilers, whyyyyyyy. I want to go home :(
It's five o'clock, so why am I still sitting here? Waiting for some urgent documents to be signed, of course.
Mum just called to see if I was counting down until five o'clock, haha. She's so cute.
One hour to go! I can taste liberty already.
Longest. Afternoon. EVER.
Already in holiday mode. My brain is occupied with packing & planning and it's impossible to concentrate on work. I just want to go home.
The city is INSANE. There are so many people, it's ridiculous.
Wondering why people still seem to think that Ada is going to be in Resident Evil 5. Ada's connection is to Leon, not Chris *facepalm*
Almost thought I was going to get stuck in the lift for a minute there. Eep.
